products.name: Samsung 55-inch 4K Smart TV
products.description: Experience stunning picture quality with this Samsung 55-inch 4K UHD Smart TV. Features HDR support, built-in streaming apps, and voice control.

products.name: Organic Whole Milk - 1 Gallon
products.description: Fresh organic whole milk from grass-fed cows. Rich in calcium and vitamin D. No artificial hormones.

products.name: Nike Air Max Running Shoes
products.description: Premium running shoes with Air Max cushioning technology. Breathable mesh upper, durable rubber sole.

products.name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Pressure Cooker
products.description: Multi-functional pressure cooker that replaces 7 kitchen appliances. 6-quart capacity perfect for families.

products.name: Crest 3D White Toothpaste - 3 Pack
products.description: Whitening toothpaste that removes up to 80% of surface stains. Fresh mint flavor. Pack of 3 tubes.

products.name: LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon
products.description: Build the iconic Millennium Falcon with this detailed LEGO set. 1,351 pieces. Includes minifigures of Han Solo, Chewbacca, and more.

products.name: Keurig K-Classic Coffee Maker
products.description: Single-serve K-Cup pod coffee maker. Brews multiple cup sizes. Simple button controls.

products.name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)
products.description: Active noise cancellation, transparency mode, personalized spatial audio. Up to 6 hours of listening time.

customer_reviews.review_text: Amazing picture quality! The 4K resolution is crystal clear and the smart features work flawlessly. Setup was easy and intuitive. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a great TV at this price point.
Great TV overall but the sound could be better. I ended up getting a soundbar. Picture is fantastic though!
This Instant Pot changed my life! I can make meals in half the time. The yogurt function is amazing too. Best kitchen appliance I've ever purchased.
Perfect running shoes! The cushioning is excellent and they're very comfortable even on long runs. Worth every penny.
My son absolutely loves this set! The build quality is excellent and it looks amazing when completed. A must-have for any Star Wars fan.
Great sound quality and the noise cancellation is impressive. Only downside is the price, but they're worth it if you can afford them.
Best organic milk I've found at Walmart. Tastes fresh and creamy. My kids love it!
Makes great coffee quickly. Very convenient for busy mornings. Wish it had a larger water reservoir.

customer_support_tickets.description: TV has a dead pixel in the bottom right corner. Noticed it after 2 days of use.
Order was supposed to arrive on Sept 25th but still hasn't shipped. Need it for a marathon next week.
Coffee maker stopped working after 3 weeks. Would like a replacement or refund.
Do these AirPods work with Android phones? Website doesn't specify clearly.

product_faqs.question: Does this TV support HDR10+?
product_faqs.answer: Yes, this Samsung TV supports HDR10, HDR10+, and HLG formats for enhanced picture quality.

product_faqs.question: Can I use this for canning?
product_faqs.answer: No, the Instant Pot Duo is not suitable for canning. Please use a dedicated pressure canner for canning purposes.

product_faqs.question: Are these AirPods water-resistant?
product_faqs.answer: Yes, AirPods Pro (2nd Gen) are sweat and water resistant with an IPX4 rating. However, they are not waterproof.
